channel.title: Individualism on Vimarsh
channel.description: Recent content in Individualism on Vimarsh

item.title: Youth and Essence of Individuality👦
item.description: I have recently observed and felt that, we the children and Youth, in order to fit into a certain designed parameters often leave behind the essence of individuality. We often leave behind our unique characteristic which make us a different person and an “Individual”. Recently I have observed that, Groupism is at its peak especially among school cultures: say you don’t like a particular thing or do not have an interest in a matter / subject – you are left out.

item.title: Youth and Essence of Individuality👦
item.description: Today’s generation, in order to fit into certain designed parameters is leaving behind their essence of individuality Depicting Individuality – A red flower in a field of Yellow Flower | Image by Rupert Britton I have recently observed and felt that, we the children and Youth, in order to fit into a certain designed parameters often leave behind the essence of individuality. We often leave behind our unique characteristic which make us a different person and an “Individual”.
